name: Polychromatic
description: Polychromatic is a physics-based arcade shooter with a pop of color.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or newer Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 Storage: 50 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Good lord I love this game, trying to beat a friends high score is ♥♥♥♥ing infuriating, but I will do it, and I will gloat about it. Just buy it, the Linux version is top quality too.
